resources.string: This is the main page of the musical app which shows a list of playable albums. I will choose Spotify Web API or SoundCloud API to load the albums and artists information.

This is the now playing page. It would look a music player with a album picture in the middle of the screen. I will be using android MediaPlayer API to stream the track. More information about this API https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/media/mediaplayer.html.

This is the store page. User can choose songs or albums they want to purchase. I am choosing In-app Billing API to managed payment flow. Another option is Stripe. More information about Stripe: https://stripe.com/docs/mobile/android.
